Player History
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 4/3/1985 to a minor league deal...
Traded from Los Angeles to San Diego on 7/5/1985 (Going to SD: RF Kenny Williams, SS Bill Russell, LF Ken Landreaux, P Charlie Kerfeld. Going to LAD: 2B Alan Wiggins, 2B Tim Flannery)...
Injured on 3/8/1988 with a Broken Ribs, out for 2-3 weeks...
Had first career hit on 5/17/1988, off Curt Schilling (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/19/1988, off Tom Candiotti (PIT)...
Hit for the cycle against Philadelphia on 8/14/1988...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Philadelphia on 8/14/1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/21/1988, hitting .538 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $414,286 through salary arbitration...
Traded from San Diego to Pittsburgh on 7/27/1990 (Going to SD: 1B Eddie Murray. Going to PIT: LF Kenny Williams)...
2/2/1991: Gets a new one-year contract worth $414,286 through salary arbitration...
